SDG_TARGET: 6.3 Reduce the discharge of untreated wastewater, primarily through innovative technologies of water purification at the national and individual levels
SDG_INDICATOR: 6.3.1 Volume of discharge of polluted (polluted without treatment or insufficiently treated) wastewater into water bodies, millions of cubic metres
indicator_name: Proportion of domestic and industrial wastewater flows safely treated
